div.h4: A tuition-free K-8 charter school serving Apache Junction, Arizona.
div.p: Let’s make the difference in your child’s education!

div.h4: It’s not about teaching; it’s about learning.
div.p: Better teachers. Better curriculum. Better education.
Smaller class sizes. Before school tutoring. After school enrichment.

div.class: et_pb_column et_pb_column_4_4 et_pb_column_0 et_pb_css_mix_blend_mode_passthrough et-last-child et_pb_column_empty

div.p: A tuition-free K-8 charter school serving Apache Junction, Arizona.
Avalon is here to empower and inspire our diverse student body to achieve academic excellence and make positive contributions to the world.

1045 South San Marcos
Apache Junction, AZ 85120

Between Ironwood and
Idaho off Broadway
